channel.title: Casey Rodarmor on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Casey Rodarmor on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: What are Ordinals?
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/456/ Casey, welcome to the show. Casey Rodarmor – 00:03:18: Thank you very much. It’s a real pleasure. I am a long-time listener of the pod. It’s on my short list of Bitcoin podcasts. So it’s really surreal. You’ve been whispering into my ear as I go to the gym and I do whatever for a long time now. So it’s very surreal to actually be talking to you in person or virtually.
